title: Connected Bluetooth Speaker says "Headset" Instead of Battery Status
content:
In the quick setting I see that my Pixel is connected to a Bluetooth speaker and below it is says "Headset" with other devices I would find the battery status for the device. Which is more useful than the "Headset" information. Especially since I turned off to use the speaker for phone calls.

Has someone an idea if there is a way to change that or is that a thing with the speaker?
